tool_description: transforms written text into different styles of mood.
title: Text Mood Changer AI

api_list.name: Mood List
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-mood-changer-ai.p.rapidapi.com/moods"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-mood-changer-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Change Text Mood
api_list.description: change the mood of the text

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: I'm sorry bro I can't attend tomorrow meeting.
